CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1972, pg. 19 reads: "The Modern Grandmothers - After 25 years of togetherness and social excitement, the Modern Grandmothers Club celebrated its silver anniversary on Sept. 9, in Terrace Room of the William Penn Hotel. Shown here are more than 40 members of the exclusive group, which is headed by Mrs. Charles Jackson, president and general chairman of the Coffee Hour Reception. - All Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Modern Grandmothers Club members standing in the Terrace Room of the William Penn Hotel for silver anniversary party
